title: Asura, after he punched a mass that extended from space.
summary: A screenshot detail/practice of Asura's Wrath, chapter 5. The camera pan showing this scene was just so well done that I wanted to connect it all into one picture, filling in the places the camera doesn’t show (since it pans down and to the right.) Nothing beats actually watching the scene, but I’m still quite happy with the result!

imgs.alt: Digital redrawing of a camera pan from Asura's Wrath. Fireballs rain down from the sky, with Asura lying face down on the ground on the right and one of his metal arms standing upright in the center.
Digital redrawing of screenshot from Asura's Wrath. Fireballs rain down from the sky, with Asura lying face down on the ground on the right and one of his metal arms standing upright in the center.
Digital redrawing of screenshot from Asura's Wrath. Fireballs rain down from the sky, with a metal arm standing upright in the center.
